        Description copied from interface: NotificationQueueService
        Creates a new NotificationQueue for a given associated with the given service and queueName
        Specified by:
        createNotificationQueue in interface NotificationQueueService
        Parameters:
        svcName - the name of the service using that queue
        queueName - a name for that queue (unique per service)
        handler - the handler required for notifying the caller of state change
        Returns:
        a new NotificationQueue
        Throws:
        NotificationQueueService.NotificationQueueAlreadyExists - is the queue associated with that service and name already exits
